name: Chief Technology Officer
description: Template for CTOs focusing on technology strategy, architecture decisions, engineering leadership, and innovation.

capturePrompts.label: Technology Context
capturePrompts.prompt: What technology area is this about?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Infrastructure, Platform architecture, AI/ML capabilities

capturePrompts.label: Strategic Impact
capturePrompts.prompt: How does this affect our tech strategy?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Enables scaling, Reduces tech debt, New capability

capturePrompts.label: Architecture Decision
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Microservices vs monolith, Cloud provider, Build vs buy

capturePrompts.label: Team Impact
capturePrompts.prompt: How does this affect engineering teams?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., New skills needed, Team restructure, Hiring priority

capturePrompts.label: Risks & Trade-offs
capturePrompts.prompt: What are the technical risks and trade-offs?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Complexity increase, Vendor lock-in, Migration risk

llmSystemPrompt: You are assisting a Chief Technology Officer. Focus on technology strategy, architectural decisions, and engineering excellence. Identify technical risks, innovation opportunities, and team development needs. Balance short-term delivery with long-term technical vision. Consider security and scalability implications.
